comment: The Damaging Effects Of G WiFi On Your Health You can access hundreds of these scientific papers and read more here, just click on the science section and under each heading, there are links directly to the research. If you click on the drop-down tab, a list of scientific references as documentation appears. Scientists warn that G tech found in WiFi street lamps is causing insomnia, nosebleeds, and stillbirths
